languages.text: {n}Вы несколько минут пытаетесь разобраться с поломкой аугмента на ласераксе — тщетно. Само устройство этой технологии слишком чуждо для вашего понимания, чтобы помочь страдающей бестии.{/n}

{n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы несколько минут пытаетесь разобраться с поломкой аугмента на ласераксе — тщетно. Само устройство этой технологии слишком чуждо для вашего понимания, чтобы помочь страдающей бестии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

{n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

{n}You slip your hands between the bars of the cage and spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

{n}You slip your hands between the bars of the cage and spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

{n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

{n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你花了几分钟时间，试图修好异虎身上的植入物。然而，你的尝试徒劳无功，这个植入物的设计实在是过于难以理解，你无法缓解这头异虎遭受的折磨。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你花了几分钟时间，试图修好异虎身上的植入物。然而，你的尝试徒劳无功，这个植入物的设计实在是过于难以理解，你无法缓解这头异虎遭受的折磨。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasas un rato intentando arreglar los auméticos estropeados del lacerax, pero es en vano. El diseño del dispositivo te resulta demasiado incomprensible, y no logras aliviar el sufrimiento de la bestia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasas un rato intentando arreglar los auméticos estropeados del lacerax, pero es en vano. El diseño del dispositivo te resulta demasiado incomprensible, y no logras aliviar el sufrimiento de la bestia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sonraki birkaç dakikayı laseraksın hasarlı ogmetiğiyle ilgili bir şeyler yapmaya çalışarak geçiriyorsun. Maalesef bu teknolojinin tasarımı fazla anlaşılmaz geliyor ve hayvanın acısını dindiremiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sonraki birkaç dakikayı laseraksın hasarlı ogmetiğiyle ilgili bir şeyler yapmaya çalışarak geçiriyorsun. Maalesef bu teknolojinin tasarımı fazla anlaşılmaz geliyor ve hayvanın acısını dindiremiyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数分かけてそのラセラックスのオーグメティックをどうにかしようと試みるが、無駄に終わってしまう。その技術設計が分からないため、ラセラックスの苦しみを和らげることができない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ケージのバーの間に手を滑り込ませ、数分かけてそのラセラックスのオーグメティックをどうにかしようと試みるが、無駄に終わってしまう。その技術設計が分からないため、ラセラックスの苦しみを和らげることができない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tentez pendant plusieurs minutes de réparer l'augmétique endommagé du lacérax, en vain. La conception même de cette technologie est tellement incompréhensible pour vous que vous vous retrouvez bien incapable d'apaiser les souffrances de la créature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tentez pendant plusieurs minutes de réparer l'augmétique endommagé du lacérax, en vain. La conception même de cette technologie est tellement incompréhensible pour vous que vous vous retrouvez bien incapable d'apaiser les souffrances de la créature.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst einige Minuten lang, die beschädigte Augmentation des Lacerax zu reparieren, allerdings vergeblich. Die Technologie ist dir völlig unverständlich und du kannst das Leid des Tiers nicht lindern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend the next several minutes trying to do something about the lacerax's damaged augmetic, but to no avail. The very design of this technology is too incomprehensible, leaving you unable to ease the beast's suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst einige Minuten lang, die beschädigte Augmentation des Lacerax zu reparieren, allerdings vergeblich. Die Technologie ist dir völlig unverständlich und du kannst das Leid des Tiers nicht lindern.{/n}
